column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''39''' is the thirty-ninth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "From [[Quendi and Eldar]], Appendix D" by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
